1.1.1.1/8
255.0.0.0 subnet
00000001.00000001.00000001.00000001 ind.ip
11111111.00000000.00000000.00000000 subnet
1.0.0.0 – 00000001.00000000.00000000.00000000 rete

OR:
00000001.00000001.00000001.00000001 ind.ip
00000000.11111111.11111111.11111111 inv.sub.
00000001.11111111.11111111.11111111 RISULTATO broadcast
1.255.255.255 broadcast
255(255x255)= 16.777.216 – 2 =  16.777.214 numero host
1.0.0.1 gateway convenzionale

------------------------------------------------


128.1.6.5/12
255.240.0.0 subnet
10000000.00000001.00000110.00000101 ind.ip
11111111.11110000.00000000.00000000 subnet
128.0.0.0 – 10000000.00000000.00000000.00000000 rete

OR:
10000000.00000001.00000110.00000101 ind.ip
00000000.00001111.11111111.11111111 inv.sub.
10000000.00001111.11111111.11111111 RISULTATO broadcast
128.15.255.255 broadcast
16(256X256) = 1.048.576 – 2 =  1.048.574 numero host
128.0.0.1 gateway convenzionale


----------------------------------------------


200.1.2.3/24
255.255.255.0
11001000.00000001.000000010.00000011 ind.ip
11111111.11111111.111111111.00000000 subnet
200.1.2.0 – 11001000.00000001.000000010.00000000 rete

OR:
11001000.00000001.00000010.00000011 ind.ip
00000000.00000000.00000000.11111111 inv.sub.
11001000.00000001.00000010.11111111 RISULTATO broadcast
200.1.2.255 broadcast
256 – 2 = 254 numero host
200.1.2.1 gateway convenzionale

----------------------------------------------------

192.192.1.1/22
255.255.252.0 subnet
11000000.11000000.00000001.00000001. ind.ip
11111111.11111111.11111100.00000000 subnet
192.192.0.0 – 11000001.11000000.00000000.00000000 rete

OR:
11000000.11000000.00000001.00000001.ind.ip
00000000.00000000.00000011.11111111 inv.sub.
11000000.11000000.00000011.11111111 RISULTATO broadcast
192.192.3.255 broadcast
256X4 = 1024 – 2 = 1022 numero host
192.192.0.1 gateway convenzionale


--------------------------------------------------


126.5.4.3/9
255.128.0.0 subnet
01111110.00000101.00000100.00000011 ind.ip
11111111.10000000.00000000.00000000 subnet
126.0.0.0 - 01111110.00000000.00000000.00000000 rete

OR:
01111110.00000101.00000100.00000011.ind.ip
00000000.01111111.11111111.11111111 inv.sub.
01111110.01111111.11111111.11111111 RISULTATO broadcast
126.127.255.255 broadcast
256(258X128) = 8.388.606 – 2 = 8.388.604 numero host
126.0.0.1 gateway convenzionale

172.16.0.4/16
255.255.0.0 subnet
10101100.00010000.00000000.00000100 ind.ip
11111111.11111111.00000000.00000000 subnet
172.16.0.0 10101100.00010000.00000000.00000000 rete

OR:
10101100.00010000.00000000.00000100.ind.ip
00000000.00000000.11111111.11111111 inv.sub.
10101100.00010000.11111111.11111111 RISULTATO broadcast
172.16.255.255 broadcast
256 X 256 = 65536 - 2 = 65534 numero host
172.16.0.1 gateway convenzionale
